mapper.select: SELECT ID_ FROM act_hi_procinst WHERE START_USER_ID_=#{userCode} AND END_TIME_ IS NULL
SELECT NAME_ FROM act_ru_task WHERE PROC_INST_ID_=#{processInstanceId}
SELECT NAME_ FROM act_re_procdef WHERE ID_ = (SELECT PROC_DEF_ID_ FROM act_hi_procinst WHERE PROC_INST_ID_=#{processInstanceId})
